data.title: Marshall Charloff & Purple Experience — Cohoes Music Hall
data.meta_description: Back by popular demand, The Purple Xperience, founded in 2011 by Dr. Fink and front-man Marshall Charloff, brings the greatest and most authentic production of Prince and The Revolution in the world to audiences of all generations.
data.text:
For assistance with tickets by phone, call the Box Office at (518) 434-0776

Back by popular demand, The Purple Xperience, founded in 2011 by Dr. Fink and front-man Marshall Charloff, brings the greatest and most authentic production of Prince and The Revolution in the world to audiences of all generations.

The Purple Xperience is a five-piece group hailing from Prince’s birthplace, Minneapolis, MN. They have been touring around the country since it’s inception in 2011 by Dr. Fink and front-man Marshall Charloff – bringing the greatest and most authentic production of Prince and The Revolution in the world to audiences of all generations. Since 2011 Purple Xperience has entertained well over 300 thousand fans and has shared the bill with The Time, Cameo, Fetty Wap, Gin Blossoms, Atlanta Rhythm section, and Cheap Trick.
